title: Novel pyrimidine linked acyl thiourea derivatives as potent α-amylase and proteinase K inhibitors: design, synthesis, molecular docking and ADME studies
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,33235-33246
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05799F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Hina Zaman, Aamer Saeed, Hammad Ismail, Sadaf Anwaar, Muhammad Latif, Muhammad Zaffar Hashmi, Hesham R. El-Seedi
To discover promising therapeutic agents, novel diaryl pyrimidine linked acyl thiourea derivatives (6a–j) were designed and synthesized via straightforward and multistep synthesis.
